p.s: The play Disgraced, Scene 3 written by Ayad Akhtar, published in 2013 deals with two couples, Emily and Amir and Isaac and Jory, who are discussing the Islam.
The given part of scene 3 starts at the dinner in Emily's and Amir's appartmentapartment where Isaac and Emily are kissing and cheating on their partners.
They are both connected with art in work.
Amir and Jory are lawyers at the same company.
Just when Emily and Isaac are kissing Jory comes in and sees them.
She is shocked and wants to if they are having an affair, but they deny it.
Amir does not say a word.
He is angry with Jory, because she told him, that their bosses are offering her a partnership and he feels betrayed, because he thinks he would deserve it more.
Jory wants Isaac and Emily to explain what happened between them, but Amir interrupts her and tells her how she does not deserve that job, because he worked harder for it.
He tells her that he is the nigger here and not she.
Isaac tries to keep Jory calm and tells her to not listen to Amir.
Isaac and Amir are getting into a intense dialogdialogue and are one second ahead from hitting each other.
But out of nowhere Amir spits in Isaac's face.
Isaac and Jory leave right after Jory tells Amir the reason why he did not get the job.
His boss doesn't trust him and avoids Amir.
After Isaac and Jory are gone, Amir wants to know if Emily is really having an affair with Isaac.
Emily confesses and tells him how bad she feels.
Amir hits Emily in the face.
He hits her more than once and her whole face is full of blood.
Amir does not understand what he is doing because of his range and violence attack.
But when he does, he is shocked.
Amir's nephew Abe knocks and comes in.
He sees Emily's face full of blood and looks at Amir, then the scene is over.
